Package com.paiondata.aristotle.common.util

Class NodeExtractor

java.lang.Object
com.paiondata.aristotle.common.util.NodeExtractor
@Component public class NodeExtractor extends Object
Extracts information from graphs and nodes.

  • Constructor Details

    • NodeExtractor

      public NodeExtractor()

  • Method Details

    • extractGraph

      public Map<String,Object> extractGraph(org.neo4j.driver.Value node)
      Extracts graph information from a given node value. If the input node is null, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown with a specific error message. If the input node is a valid NodeValue, it extracts and returns a map containing the graph information.
      Parameters:
      node - the node value to extract graph information from
      Returns:
      a map containing the graph information
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the input node is null

    • extractNode

      public NodeVO extractNode(org.neo4j.driver.Value node)
      Extracts node information from a given node value. If the input node is null, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown with a specific error message. If the input node is a valid NodeValue, it extracts and returns a NodeVO object containing the node information.
      Parameters:
      node - the node value to extract node information from
      Returns:
      a NodeVO object containing the node information
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the input node is null

    • extractNodes

      public Set<NodeVO> extractNodes(org.neo4j.driver.Value nodesValue)
      Extracts multiple nodes from a given nodes value. If the input nodes value is null, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown with a specific error message. If the input nodes value is valid, it extracts and returns a set of NodeVO objects representing the node.
      Parameters:
      nodesValue - the nodes value to extract nodes from
      Returns:
      a set of NodeVO objects representing the nodes
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the input nodes value is null
